name: The Lords of the Earth Flame
description: The Lords of The Earth Flame is a novel game created in the best traditions of interactive fiction and text-based role-playing. Non-linear structure, rich text core, and the “analog” feel of times past are certain to provide unforgettable gaming experience for hours on end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3+ or higher Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: im not saying this novel game is bad or not worth the money, its just not very long or fleshed out. for example, i have finished it on my first try without dying once, in 5 minutes, the replay the game skipping the text for choices i have already don to beat it again in a different way in 3 mins. after replaying it many times and getting as many endings i can, my total time hasnt expanded past an hour. on top of that the bad ends just seem poorly done in a way that two routes will lead up to the same end or, also, a ending that doesnt change no matter what choices were made previosly. if im not making sense here just know this, i was dissapointed by the length and the meaningless choices that just seem to pad things out, very little on top of that. the good parts are aas followes: - a soundtrack, not the best for reading to but wasnt expecting this in a novel based game anyway - great artwork, this made for a more immersive experiance overall - an interesting world, just wish this was more fleshed out  cons: - very short, read opening paragraph - linear story, but multiple endings, this is hard to explain - not a text based rpg like i origanly thought, but thats my fault  overall this is just not my type of story, too short for me but i will say it is well worth the money, no problems there  if you want a short story with nice pictures then this is for you if not, well, too bad
this game is pretty good with very interesting story the only cons is the story is too short :( other than that its really good :3
